mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOPMENU (MENUNUM,SHOPNUM,SALE) SELECT MENUNUM, #{shopNum}, MENUSALE FROM MENU WHERE MENUSALE=1
mapper.select: SELECT S.MENUNUM, M.MENUNAME, M.PRICE, S.SALE FROM SHOPMENU S INNER JOIN MENU M USING(MENUNUM) WHERE S.SHOPNUM = #{shopNum}
SELECT SHOPNUM, SHOPNAME FROM SHOP WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOPMENU SET SALE=#{sale} WHERE SHOPNUM=#{shopNum} and MENUNUM=#{menuNum}
UPDATE SHOP SET SHOPNAME=#{shopName}, SHOPPHONE=#{shopPhone}, OPENTIME=#{openTime}, CLOSETIME=#{closeTime} WHERE SHOPNUM=#{shopNum}
